hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: IMAGE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to a raw disk image or a directory prefix. If a directory is specified, looks for dirname.img and attempts to inject AMI name in clovr.conf upon successful build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: INIT_SCRIPT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Script to run before bundling the DIAG image

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt #Need to redirect to /dev/null because of large stdout, progress bar sudo -E /opt/vappio-util/vp-bundle-diag -f $IMAGE_NAME $INIT_SCRIPT
